ygData.subject: Re: Lizard Man
ygData.msgSnippet: Good idea Jynxx ... in fact, if the lizardmen are evil then maybe the cat creatures could be good. A balance issue in effect. The problem with both races is
ygData.messageBody:
Good idea Jynxx ... in fact, if the lizardmen are evil then maybe the cat
creatures could be good. A balance issue in effect. The problem with both races
is how intelligent will they be? A lizard wizard would be fun but what about a
wizzy kitty? Sorry, that was corny. I'll shut up now. =)

-Faderic


Jynxx wrote:

> From: "Jynxx" <Jynxx@...>
>
> Hey...all this talk about how cool lizard men would be to play.....what
> about those cat-things on the island of Erud's Crossing? Tell me those would
> not make the coolest monks ever! All different kinds of claws to wear, plus
> a pounce/bite or something. I'm hoping they come in the expansion as well =]
>
> Tyveris
>
